message.cobblemoneternal.error: ERROR, please report how and when this appeared to the MCE Team!
cobblemoneternal.intentionally_untexture: This item has no Texture yet, this is Intended!
message.cobblemoneternal.command.force_s: Encounter "%s" has been forcibly spawned near %s
message.cobblemoneternal.command.set_reg: Set Regi Puzzles to Set %s. Restart world to reset.
Puzzle index '%s' is Out of Bounds. Maximum is %s.
message.cobblemoneternal.feature.bottle_: Your Pokémon must be atleast Level 50 to use Bottle Caps!
message.cobblemoneternal.fail_party_cond: It doesn't react. It must want something specific from your Party Pokémon.
message.cobblemoneternal.fail_party_leve: The Construct does not acknowledge your strength. Return with a Level %s+ Pokémon
item.cobblemoneternal.bottle_cap.name: Bottle Cap
item.cobblemoneternal.bottle_cap.desc: Craft with a Mint Leaf to choose IV to Maximize
When in the Offhand, Bottle Caps will Minimize IVs
cobblemoneternal.species.barry.name: Barry
cobblemoneternal.species.barry.desc: A Mischevious Rodent with unfathomable power.
cobblemoneternal.species.snom-eternal.de: Thanks to its hard icy shell protecting it, this Pokémon has plenty of time to think. It has been observed to frequently answer questions from other Pokémon.
cobblemoneternal.species.rotom-eternal.d: Despite being shaped similarly to a Lightbulb, this Pokémon isn't very bright. When interacting with Snom, it can often be seen teasing them.
